summary:
some people wanted me to upload this after watching my video so here it is
it is a cliff bunker i hope you enjoy it
THIER IS A VIDEO ON THE MOD PAGE
if anyone has any more build ideas that are good,creative,fresh and new post a comment and i 
might make your request(houses/terrain only)
descriptionHtml:
I made this as a little beginner player home.
It has everything a new player coming into the game will want.
Also I still think its great for just a quick home!!
I made it look like it does because i wanted it to look like it went through a old Skyrim war that is why ive put certain items into the Cliff Bunker.Boards are crooked because i wanted to give it that old aged affect
(((This is the Final Version)))
-----
Comes with everything a player home would come with+ more!
It Contains:
*Lots of Storage
*Bed Cot
*Work Beach
*Smithing Anvil
*Grindstone
*Tanning Rack
*Alchemy Station
*Arcane Enchanter
*Cooking Pot
*Archery Targets(1)
*Practice Dummys(3)
*Weapon Racks(2 diffrent kinds)(x8)
*Jazbay Plants outside
*Other basic things(lots)
-----
*Thier is a Map Marker.
*ITS LOCATED NEXT TO THE RIVERWOOD BRIDGE UP ON THE CLIFT.
JUST TAKE THE PATH UP TILL YOU SEE A PLANK.
*esp file is called MountainPlankHome.
*NO navmesh, very had to make it work on thos stairs, so i would just tell your companions to wait where the begning of the stairs start.
author: Meowmixyum
